game

Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Shop

  • public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    vsh33 Shop is a class that holds all the attirbutes of a shop the user can navigate through Items and information is displayed in the shop for the hero to purchase and use

      • generateItems

        public void generateItems()
        Generates the healing items in the shop. The switch randomises the availability, of certain healing items where it can have a range of either none or all the items. Options are determined by random generator.

      • generatePowerUps

        public void generatePowerUps()
        Generates the powerup items in the shop. The switch randomises the availability, of certain healing items where it can have a range of either none or all the items. Options are determined by random generator.

      • generateMaps

        public void generateMaps()
        Generates the number of maps able to be purchased by the user. Buy options vary from zero to six available maps.

      • getPowerupNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPowerupNames()
        Generates the powerup names into a list, where it can be displayed in the shop
        Returns:
        names - list of names of all the powerups

      • getItemNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getItemNames()
        Generates the healing items names into a list, where it can be displayed in the shop
        Returns:
        names - list of names of all the healing items

      • getMapNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMapNames()
        Generates the names of all the maps into a list, where it can be displayed in the shop
        Returns:
        names - list of names of all the maps
